item.name: Heartfire Mantle
entries: The inside of this heavy leather cloak is decorated with the image of a roaring fireplace. Brick-like patches of leather line the rim of the cloak, which always feel fire-warmed to the touch. While wearing the cloak, you can tolerate temperatures as low as -45°C without any additional protection. Laying the cloak on the ground or hanging it on a wall with its fiery inside exposed creates as much warmth as a small campfire.
You can use an action while wearing the cloak to speak one of its two command words and activate its properties.

entries.name: Kindle
entries: You ignite a flammable object you're holding.

entries.name: Warm
entries: Nonhostile creatures within 10 feet of you gain 2d6 temporary hit points. A creature with these hit points can tolerate temperatures as low as -45°C without any additional protection. Once this property of the cloak has been used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.
